title: F.O.N.G. Encyclopedia
description: A comprehensive guide to the repository, its projects, and its maintainers.

entries.definition: Internal Only. Key strengths: Pending.
Stack animals as high as you can without toppling over.
Play Chess, Checkers, Xiangqi and more.
Smash bricks with a ball and paddle. Now with particles!
Hacking simulator. Crack the numeric code against time.
Blackjack, War, and more built on a robust shared engine.
Senior Developer / Docs. Key strengths: Reasoning, Planning, QA.
Cloudflare Workers (optional proxy)
Family recipes and cooking guide.
The foundational architecture for the family digital archive. Stands for 'Founding & Forging' (Legacy) or 'Fong Family Arcade' (Modern).
Connect matching colors with pipes across the board.
Standard MIT / GPL. Key strengths: Updated.
Creative Director. Key strengths: Content, Assets, Rapid Prototyping.

Barcode and QR code scanner with multiple detection modes.

High-velocity quiz engine. Test your reflexes and knowledge.
Lead Architect. Key strengths: Git Ops, Refactoring, Integration.

Amazon Corporate. Key strengths: Active.

The classic game of snake. Eat apples, grow long, don't crash.
The classic patience card game. Klondike rules.
